EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Business Aviation Newsletter - April 2017 Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER April 2017 CITATION OWNERS: DON’T BE LATE FOR YOUR ADS-B DATE Honeywell has ADS-B Out solutions for your Citation that satisfy the 2020 mandate. Begin your upgrade today!
READ MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/ads-b-mandates]]> Upgrade to Primus Elite displays for a clearer view Primus Elite® 875/885 is a liquid crystal display for CRT form/fit upgrade providing improved clarity, safety and increased aircraft value. And upgrade options add even more... Read more. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/PrimusElite875_885.html]]> Stay connected with Apps from Honeywell Honeywell's GoDirect portfolio of services and applications that improve the safety, efficiency and comfort of flying... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2017/march/stay-connected-with-apps-from-honeywell]]> New tools for landing at challenging airports Landing a business jet full of passengers is a huge responsibility for pilots, especially when faced with adverse conditions like turbulence, brutal crosswinds, mountainous terrain and busy airspaces... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/blogs/2017/march/landing-at-some-of-the-most-challenging-airports-with-new-software-and-connectivity-pilot-tools]]> MyAerospace Portal now has faster search capabilities MyAerospace search capability not only helps you find information faster, but enables you to perform tasks more efficiently... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2017/march/faster-search-capability]]>
